minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I think we need to address both team building & hiring and technology infrastructure & scaling today.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your ML pipeline is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: We're addressing the accuracy issues and expect churn to improve next quarter.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Customer retention is more important than acquisition right now. Build for scalability.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Actually, let me clarify... our training data is showing 92% accuracy, and the SAM is improving.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Focus on user adoption first. I made similar mistakes in my early days.
